attributes.action: Ban the spraying of any substance from aircraft over or near UK airspace.
attributes.additional_details:
I have collected evidence of:
Aircraft  producing clouds, which should not be the case.
Aerosol delivery systems fitted to Airbus A320 family aircraft.
Irregular flight patterns consistent with climate engineering programs.
Chemicals being delivered to UK hub airports from Africa via scheduled flights.
A refusal to act, acknowledge or investigate the issue from relevant organisations such as the CAA, NATS, MET Office.
attributes.background: Commercial aircraft are spraying substances unknown into our atmosphere during flight. Both UK registered and international carriers are seen spraying while in UK airspace. Commercial aircraft have been modified with aerosol delivery systems in the pylon for this purpose. The CAA are failing to act.
